synopsis.text: Yuu Higashi, a high school student with a burning ambition to become an idol, embarks on a decade-long journey as depicted in the novel Trapezium. To realize her dream, Yuu imposes four stringent rules upon herself: avoiding social media, refraining from having a boyfriend, maintaining a low profile at school, and befriending beautiful girls from each cardinal direction.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
